name: Psychopathics
description: Escape the 7 psychopathics and find exit to survive in this best horror game!
minimum_requirements: OS: Windows 7 Processor: Intel Dual-Core 2GHz or AMD Dual-Core 2GHz Memory: 4 GB RAM Graphics: NVIDIA GeForce 400 series or AMD Radeon HD 6000 series, 1GB Video Card (Minimum Shader Model 2.0) DirectX: Version 9.0c Storage: 4 GB available space
